Title: Cross-Site Scripting in bootstrap-vue
Description: Versions of `bootstrap-vue` are vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting. Due to insufficient input sanitization, components may be vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting through the `options` variable. This may lead to the execution of malicious JavaScript on the user's browser.
Solution: Upgrade to version 2.0.0-rc.12 or above. *Note*: 2.0.0-rc.12 may be an unstable version. Use caution.
